channel.title: 2007 Runescape remake
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape,
To be honest with you guys, I'm so pissed off at the moment. I've just downloaded RS2007 (a Runescape remake) then I compiled it and BAM 100 errors. These just look pathetic so I didn't bother trying to rix them. It was obiously put there on purpose by that faggot Rs-vault.
I was just wondering about the best base to make a Runescape re-make. I don't want no idiots flaming like 'Many people have tried this' I was just want to know a stable, user friendly base.
- Micorfire.

item.title: 2007 Runescape remake
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:4, topic:401841"][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=498892.msg3648510#msg3648510 date=1309554340]

Sever helpers are supposed to be role models and you are no role model.
[/quote]Are you attempting you imply you are more of a role model than I, or anyone else on these forums? You go around and flame/flamebait everyone. Grow the fuck up, and stop (:

I’m not going to SAY that… HOWEVER, I WILL say that if everyone on this forum was me we would not be having this argument right now. We would also have a Utopian forum with a perfectly functioning system.

I don’t flame people? Give me one instance.[/quote]If everyone one on this forum was you…Then well…Never mind to much to say not enough time.

Read full topic

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=498892.msg3648409#msg3648409 date=1309550246]

i got 100 error help ??
[/quote]every error means u missed bracket }
so u gotta add 100 } in the middle of the file

OMG RLY THANX FOR HELP WILL READ AGAIN REP + +
[/quote]glad i help[/quote]
Unfortunately, I can’t rep you for some reason.
